description: This week, our first place winner on the insightful side is Bloof, responding to a complaint that our negative coverage of Elon Musk prevents us covering other completely made-up transphobic stuff: The difference is that the things Elon does is actually happeni9ng, while the things you feel we -should- be concerned about are just 4chan […]
title: Funniest/Most Insightful Comments Of The Week At Techdirt
